short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves the course registration process for Texas A&M students in the university's registration portal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We've all been there. 20 tabs of Rate My Professor, Howdy, and AggieScheduler open and you still don't know what classes or professors to take. bthoRegistration streamlines the overly stressful steps and headaches of registering for classes at Texas A&M.

- Edits the UI of Howdy to consolidate basic class information into one column.

- Displays grade distributions for professors/classes.

- Provides links for RateMyProfessor listings.

- Adds a mock schedule feature in popup window.

Grade distribution data is comprised of web-scraped data from the official TAMU registrar website. This data covers all colleges from Spring 2010 - Spring 2020, encompassing over 145,000 data entries.
